thread.title: Antoine Griezmann to Manchester United: France ace agrees deal in principle - report
thread.title_full: Antoine Griezmann to Manchester United: France ace agrees deal in principle - report

title: Antoine Griezmann to Manchester United: France ace agrees deal in principle - report
text:
Antoine Griezmann to Manchester United: France ace agrees deal in principle - report ANTOINE GRIEZMANN has agreed to join Manchester United in the summer, according to reports in France. PUBLISHED: 22:33, Wed, Feb 1, 2017 | UPDATED: 22:40, Wed, Feb 1, 2017 
The France star is Jose Mourinho's primary summer transfer target and it appears the United boss has moved a step closer to achieving a deal. 
MORE TO FOLLOW Five most likely summer deals according to the bookies Wed, February 1, 2017 Express Sport takes a look at the five most likely deals that could happen this summer. Odds provided by BetStars
